divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my girlfriends computer with my headphones on when she ran in the house tapping my shoulder then running back out saying telling me to come outside and to hurry, and then there it was. A giant orange sphere that kinda pulsated before it went out. I ran in the house to grab the camera but by the time I came back it had vanished. I Have seen UFO's before and I'm pretty sure that what I was viewing was not man made. From her side of the event. She was outside smoking when a Giant orange light streaked across at a downward angle with a jet like roar. At first she thought it was a meteor coming to kill us all until it stopped in its tracks starting to fade away. She then ran inside to grab me.
trends: there have been no other sightings in lake elsinore \ wildomar
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: Orange light streaks across then hovers in lake elsinore ca 12/1/2011
